Welcome!

This is a personal website created for the purpose of showing off the skills learned so far in the Correlation One Software Development Program.

Introduction

Let's get things started. The purpose of this site is to give you some insight to not only who I am as a person. but to also show off the skills i've learned so far in the Correlation One Software Development Program.

Who is Matty Schluer?

My name is Matty Schluer. I am 22 years old, and I currently work as an IT equipment coordinator for Amazon. My job is handling equipment, doing repairs, taking inventory, managing requests, etc.

My Journey to Become a Developer

I took a computer class in 10th grade that taught us JavaScript. That class is what introduced me to programming. Since then I've used resources like the Odin Project, Codecademy, and freecodecamp more and more as I dove deeper into the work of software development in my free time. Slowly figuring out how it all works, and deciding what languages peaked my interest most. Eventually, I got to where I am now!

Skills

So far in this program I've learned advanced HTML and CSS. Which also includes SCSS, SASS and Bootstrap. I've also learned the basics of UI/UX design.
